name: cyoa-vue-app
description: CYOA experimental Vue app, now also with Vite.

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p ./dist ./dist/js && npm run build:css && npm run build:vue && npm run copy:html
scripts.qbuild: npm run clean && mkdir -p ./dist ./dist/js && npm run copy:css && npm run build:vue && npm run copy:html
scripts.dev: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/css dist/js && npm run watch:css & npm run watch:html & npm run watch:js
